scripts.postinstall: for dir in */ ;  do echo "$dir"; ( cd "$dir" ; npm install > installResults.log 2>&1 ; ) ;done
scripts.buildappjs: for dir in */ ;  do echo "$dir"; ( cd "$dir" ; npm run-script build > buildResults.log 2>&1; ) ; done
scripts.runalltests: for dir in */ ;  do echo "$dir"; ( cd "$dir" ; npm test > testResults.log 2>&1; ) ; done
